code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with mild constipation, mild cramping, mild abdominal pain and Stomach for 5 weeks. he has a history of Irritable Bowel for past 4 years. patient is a 23 yo male. o:Height 72 in, Weight 128 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, distension, no hepatomegaly a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed fluoxetine - 20 mg daily, and ordered CBC.

s:pt presents with mild cramping, mild abdominal pain and mild constipation. he is a m transit planner aged 24 yrs. he denies ever using cigarettes drinks daily o:Height 71 in, Weight 127 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, distension, no hepatomegaly a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dicyclomine - 20 mg 4 x day, and ordered CBC.
